# third_party/

This directory is for large third-party projects that are **not tracked by Git**.

## GPT-SoVITS

`1.启动GPT-Sovits.bat` expects this layout:

```
third_party/
  GPT-SoVITS-v2pro-20250604-nvidia50/
```

Place your local GPT-SoVITS folder here (downloaded/cloned separately), then run
`1.启动GPT-Sovits.bat`.
